pages.text: seonsillo hananim-eun geolughan bam-ei gyesileul naelinani
geojughan bam-i mueos-inji mueos-i geudaeege seolmyeonghayeo juliyo
geolughan i bam-eun cheongaewolboda deo hullyunghan bam-eulo
i bam-e cheonsadeulgwa gabeuliel cheonsaga junim-ui myeonglyeong-eul bad-a ganglim hayeo
achim dongnyeok-kkaji meomuleumyeo pyeong-an hasoseo lago insahadeola
seongseoui baegseongdeul gaunde jinli leul geoyeoghan jadeulgwa bulsinjadeul-eun bun myeonghan yejeung-i geudeul-ege ileul ttae kkaji geudeul-eun gil-eul tteonalyeo haji ani hayeossnola
i yejeung-eun seongseuleoun malsseum-eul nangsonghal hananim-ui seonjijalo
geu an-eneun olbaleun yulbeob-i iss nola
seongseoui baegseongdeul-eun geudeul-ege bunmyeonghan yejeung-i ileul ttae kkaji uigyeon-euldallihaji ani haess-euni
geudeul-ege jueojin myeonglyeong-eun ha nanim-eul gyeongbaehago jinsilhan mid-eum-i doedolog geubunkke heonsinhamyeo gidoleul deuligo iseullamseleul bachineun geosdeul-ichamdoen sin-ang-ila
sillo seongseoui baegseongdeul jung-e jin lileul geoyeoghan jadeulgwa bulsinjadeul-eun buljiog-e issge doelini geudeul-eun geu an-eseo yeongjuhamae gajang saaghan mu lideul-ila
geuleona mid-eum-eulo seon-eul silcheonhaneun jadeul-eun gajang uiloun jadeullo
